summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Polytrade application with 3 services (backend, frontend, ML worker). Backend and ML worker health endpoints working. WebSocket connections established. Some API endpoints missing/returning 404. Frontend serving content but browser automation tool had URL resolution issues.

missing_endpoints.impact: Frontend may not be able to fetch market data with generic endpoint

integration_issues.issue: Tool not respecting page_url parameter, defaulting to localhost:3000 instead of localhost:5675
integration_issues.impact: Unable to properly test frontend UI interactions
integration_issues.fix_priority: LOW - Testing tool issue, not app issue

working_features.details: Serving HTML content properly, Vite dev server active

passed_tests: Market data API (with correct endpoint path)
action_item_for_E1: 1. Review API endpoint routing - some endpoints return 404 that should be accessible. 2. Verify frontend-backend integration for market data fetching. 3. Consider adding generic /api/markets endpoint that redirects to /api/markets/poloniex-futures-v3/symbols for better frontend compatibility.
